isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - INSTALL

svcsubsecinfo.para: Refer to the Component Location Section when performing the installation procedures for the APADS components.
Refer to GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the A/C system components.

svcproc.title: APADS CONTROL MODULE
svcproc.para: The APADS control module install procedures are in the following steps.

step1.para: Position the APADS control module so that the diagnostic lights are clearly visible.
Install the APADS control module using two bolts to secure module to the vehicle bulkhead wall located on the right or left sides of the engine, or in the right side luggage compartment.
Connect the APADS control module cable connectors to the wiring harness.
Band and secure the loose wires so they do not hang freely.
